name: MaFl_Bobochan
oralText: Step right up, adventurers! BoBoChan's Upgrade Shop is open for business!
introText: Rhisis have mercy on this poor soul. You actually fight monsters with that?! Good grief! Please, allow me to help you upgrade it...
byeText: Goodbye, friend! Remember, for the best upgrades in Madrigal, visit BoBoChan!

links.title: Who are you?
texts: What, you haven't heard of me? I'm BoBoChan, the most well known upgrade specialist in all of Madrigal. I love what I do, and people come from all over the world for my services.

links.title: Goodbye!
texts: Goodbye, friend! Remember, for the best upgrades in Madrigal, visit BoBoChan!
